attributes.action: make fathers who consistanly dont turn up for visits or bother to contact week to week give up parental rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: fathers who have been given access to thier child as long as notice has been given but then dont turn up or cancel because something better has come up, who dont call their child when they have been told no begged to by the mother, who abuses the mother verbally most of the time , who causes set back in childs development by not following guides given by main parent , who lets their child become upset that he has not visited or called should be made to give up parental rights completley, as it is for all to see they really cant be bothered with the child unless there is nothing else to do that day, that is not a parent that is a interested bystander, make then wake up to how they are harming their child, take their parental rights away and let the mother prevent her child from being harmmed by someone her child should be able to rely on. thankyou
